summary: Marauders Stans made me hate the Marauders and the jily ship even more than before. I feel like people can’t like the Marauders...
body: Marauders Stans made me hate the Marauders and the jily ship even more than before. I feel like people can’t like the Marauders without turning them into pure angels and blaming Severus for everything. Who would want to be part of a community like that ? 🧐🤯

summary:
Hey, you!
 Do you want to play a too-rich, entirely spoiled, well-meaning French Pureblood?  Does a magical vineyard owner or a...
caption:
Hey, you!

Do you want to play a too-rich, entirely spoiled, well-meaning French Pureblood?  Does a magical vineyard owner or a pegasus breeder appeal to you?  Or perhaps you want the Mr. Darcy-type Heir whose only job is to marry someone, but s

Hell, maybe you want the artsy soulful unemployed one, or the rebellious baby of the family who really thinks he’s making it on his own, but his family is actually still paying for it all.

The Monets are looking for the rest of their siblings in a King Arthur themed family ad! 
Join Age of Aquarius, a modern tech Harry Potter site where members drive the plots!

summary: New fic posted
title: New fic posted
body:
It can be found: here

Summary:
Its 1996, Voldemort has taken the fight directly to Hogwarts
-
The hall was in a state of shock. The Order were struck dumb, unable to even begin forming words to possibly deal with what was going on in front of their eyes.
For once in her life Hermione was unable to process what was going on, completely stunned by what she was witnessing because it was just so wrong, so terribly wrong

It can be found: here

tags: harry potter and the philosopher's stone
summary: Harry Potter and the Philosopher’s stone - Shakespearean Edition
title: Harry Potter and the Philosopher’s stone - Shakespearean Edition
body:
“Mr. And Mrs. Dursley of number four, Privet Drive, wast fustian to declare yond they wast perfectly ingraft, thank thou very much.” 

“I desire thou’re did please with yourselves. We couldst all hast been did kill — or worse, expelled. Anon if ’t be true thou don’t mind, I’m going to catch but a wink chamber.” 

“’t dost not doth well to dwell on dreams and forget to liveth.”

 ”’t doth take a most wondrous deal of bravery to standeth up to our enemies, but just as much to standeth up to our cater-cousins.“ 

"thou’re a dram scary oft, thou wot yond? Brilliant. But scary, ”        

  1. Translator: http://funtranslations.com/shakespeare
  2. Text: Harry Potter and the Philosopher’s Stone by J.K. Rowling

  1. Translator: http://funtranslations.com/shakespeare
  2. Text: Harry Potter and the Philosopher’s Stone by J.K. Rowling

 ”’t doth take a most wondrous deal of bravery to standeth up to our enemies, but just as much to standeth up to our cater-cousins.“ 

"thou’re a dram scary oft, thou wot yond? Brilliant. But scary, ”        

  1. Translator: http://funtranslations.com/shakespeare
  2. Text: Harry Potter and the Philosopher’s Stone by J.K. Rowling
trail.content:
“Mr. And Mrs. Dursley of number four, Privet Drive, wast fustian to declare yond they wast perfectly ingraft, thank thou very much.”

summary: The Worlds of Wonderland and Hogwarts in Melbourne
title: The Worlds of Wonderland and Hogwarts in Melbourne
excerpt: An interruption in my usual travel vlogs to recommend two wonderful things happening in Melbourne. Wonderland | ACMI Exhibition April 5th - October 7th https...
description: Also whilst I’m talking I went to the Alice and Wonderland Exhibit and PUFFS and this was my opinion. I absolutely loved PUFFS, I was questioning the $70 tickets (I am rather stingy) BUT it was amazinggggg, I literally had tears of laughter through the entire first act. I’m not sure if it’s running for much longer but if you’re in Melbourne and potter fan I 100% recommend it.

reblog.comment: Also whilst I’m talking I went to the Alice and Wonderland Exhibit and PUFFS and this was my opinion. I absolutely loved PUFFS, I was questioning the $70 tickets (I am rather stingy) BUT it was amazinggggg, I literally had tears of laughter through the entire first act. I’m not sure if it’s running for much longer but if you’re in Melbourne and potter fan I 100% recommend it.

summary: I don’t understand some people in this fandom who headcanon Harry raises Teddy. Andromeda is Ted’s grandmother and relative, of...
body: I don’t understand some people in this fandom who headcanon Harry raises Teddy. Andromeda is Ted’s grandmother and relative, of course she wants to raise him! (and is max. 48 years old, so at least she is able to do so.)

blog.name: accio-shitpost
blog.title: shitpost managed
blog.description:
FAQ

unforgivably cursing you with our existence since 1965

as seen in Bo Burnham's Eighth Grade, apparently

we have a Discord server! join here! (15+ only please)

we track the tag 'accioshitpost' (without a dash) so if you have art or a fic based on of one of our posts, pop it in there and we'll reblog it for you! we always appreciate your creativity!

you can find our amazon wishlists here and here - if you get us anything, we'll post a picture and a thank you note!!

if you want to follow our personal blogs, here's Roxie's, here's Persephone's, and here's Jamie's

nazis, terfs, pedos, and anybody happy to defend or stand by them can leave. we don't want you. avada kedavra, shithead.

now in blue raspberry flavours, hitting stores soon!

tags: harry potter and the cursed child
summary: general question for the audience (not that I have any) BUT I would like opinions on whether it is worth it or not to go see the...
body:
general question for the audience (not that I have any) BUT I would like opinions on whether it is worth it or not to go see the cursed child? It’s gonna cost like $630 for my partner and I to go and that’s a week’s pay LOL

I totally regret missing out on early bird cause now I won’t see it until at least may/jun and that’s a fucking pain so I’m starting to question whether or not it’s worth it

Opinions please!

blog.name: delightingintherain
blog.title: A Fondness for Quiet Moments
blog.description:
About me:
Khai. 25. PNW Washington. Autistic. Non-binary and utterly queer. Polyamorous, sex-positive, kinky, body-positive, feminist, and all about consent. "They, them, their" pronouns. Debilitating migraines, POTS, and NMH.

This blog is a collection of my interests. From fandoms to nature photography and outer space. Sometimes I write fanfiction. Feel free to send me an ask any time, I tend to be friendly.

- SOME NSFW CONTENT -
LGBTQ+ friendly space
" We’re stronger in the places that we’ve been broken."
- By Ernest Hemingway

summary:
Draco: Harry.
Harry: ...
Draco: Harry? 
Harry: ...
Draco, rolling his eyes: ...Potter? 
Harry, smiling up at him innocently:...
body:
Draco: Harry.

Harry: …

Draco: Harry?

Harry: …

Draco, rolling his eyes: …Potter?

Harry, smiling up at him innocently: Yes, Malfoy?

Draco: You’re a right prat, you know that?! *throws a beautifully wrapped present at Harry and stomps off*

Draco, yelling over his shoulder: Happy birthday!

summary:
index . face claim . want ads

 Technology has come to the wizarding world, and with it, chaos. While many support the...
caption:
index . face claim . want ads

Technology has come to the wizarding world, and with it, chaos. While many support the progress into the modern era, there are those who oppose it, seeing it as an abandonment of the wizarding way of life and a threat to the Statute of Secrecy.

Age of Aquarius
modern technology with an original plot!
character driven events

A war is beginning, lines are being drawn in the sand…
Where will you take your stand?

Technology has come to the wizarding world, and with it, chaos. While many support the progress into the modern era, there are those who oppose it, seeing it as an abandonment of the wizarding way of life and a threat to the Statute of Secrecy.

Age of Aquarius
modern technology with an original plot!
character driven events

A war is beginning, lines are being drawn in the sand…
Where will you take your stand?
